    • Uses of Device in org.dcm4che3.conf.api.internal

      Methods in org.dcm4che3.conf.api.internal with parameters of type Device 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void DicomConfigurationManager.preventDeviceModifications(Device d)
      Remembers a weak reference to the provided device so that any subsequent call to persist or merge for this specific instance is made, an error is logged.
